title: I got penalised for what fucking reason?
body:
So my teammate banned my champ so i had to pick another champ to play. I was harassed the entire game by all my teammates and i was banned for throw some insult here and there but yeah don't mind that negative attitude from my teammates the entire game. A teammate from our team that banned my champ also harassed me as well

I also wanna know why we can't read team chat but only we can read my own chat?

What the hell?!

replies.body: Others behavior does not excuse yours. You do not get to flame people **ever** - even if they started it, or even if they’re breaking rules themselves. You admit you were flaming and harassing your teammates - thus you were behaving poorly, and you were punished for it.

> [{quoted}](name=Chermorg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=p9YhQ5P4,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-01-29T17:16:02.026+0000)
>
> Others behavior does not excuse yours. You do not get to flame people **ever** - even if they started it, or even if they’re breaking rules themselves. You admit you were flaming and harassing your teammates - thus you were behaving poorly, and you were punished for it.

NO I did not admit I was harassing my teammates and just because i threw couple of insults does not mean i harass them. It was the other way around

NO I was not flaming either. 

I don't think you understand what harassment and flaming is exactly
Please post your chat logs to prove that then. You do not need the team conversation. This is your punishment, it is based solely on your chat logs, and not anyone else’s.

> [{quoted}](name=Chermorg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=p9YhQ5P4,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2018-01-29T17:23:52.296+0000)
>
> Please post your chat logs to prove that then. You do not need the team conversation. This is your punishment, it is based solely on your chat logs, and not anyone else’s.

Like I said i will not post my own conversation cause I want to post the entire team conversation even if their names are not shown

In league reasons does not matter like why you did insult (insult back). It only matters that you threw couple of insults and you get banned so fuck reasons

Yes. Exactly. It does not matter *why* you insulted. It does not matter what the teammates said. You were punished for *your* chat.

Riot will not release the other teammates’ chat logs to you, nor will you be able to access them.

Question though

I've noticed that in a downloaded replay i was watching, the Chat still appears (from my team amyway). So if the OP was to copy down what they were saying and post it here, is that against the rules (no names of course)?
It’s not going to be against the rules, but there’s no point, as it doesn’t matter and will likely be ignored by posters here.
I figured, but at least it would get him to post the logs
No need to worry about that. A resident certain someone will appear in time to clarify the situation.

do you mean....

HIM???
Yeah. I do mean HIM! HE always comes to enlighten the darkness! Just wait and HE will be here!
{{summoner:11}}

> [{quoted}](name=SlashStriker,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=p9YhQ5P4,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-29T17:33:05.965+0000)
>
> Like I said i will not post my own conversation cause I want to post the entire team conversation even if their names are not shown
> 
> In league reasons does not matter like why you did insult (insult back). It only matters that you threw couple of insults and you get banned so fuck reasons

Okay then might as well delete thread.

NO I did not admit I was harassing my teammates and just because i threw couple of insults does not mean i harass them. 

??????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????

You basically just said "if i stabbed someone, that doesnt mean im killing them"

??????????????

Eh, I get it. "Harassing" implies a continued and longer-term action. OP claims to have only tossed a couple insults, which could be considered flaming, but perhaps not harassing. 

Still, chat logs would be helpful here.
Care to share some chat logs so we can see just how bad your insults were?  Generally if you got banned for chat then perhaps muting and doing your best would have been a safer option.

> [{quoted}](name=Selegun,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=p9YhQ5P4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-29T17:07:43.386+0000)
>
> Care to share some chat logs so we can see just how bad your insults were?  Generally if you got banned for chat then perhaps muting and doing your best would have been a safer option.

I can't cause it's written only what i said and does not show the entire team conversation

Which always happens, because what you said is all that really matters.

Look, we sympathize if you were trolled or baited, but flaming is flaming. Expecting a subjective interpretation of who "started it" or who "deserved it" to absolve players of their responsibility is simply unworkable. Simply, you're expected not to flame people, period.
"Can't"

Because each person is responsible for their own behavior and their behavior alone. They'll be judged for their behavior depending on their own standing in the system and their behavior in their games. Just as you're judged for yours'
https://i.imgur.com/wZAK1eX.png
I suggest reading the rules. That should clear things up for you.
Just cuz they flame doesn't mean on any terms what-so-ever that you have the right to flame them back.
